desc.en: KRYD analyzes the behavior of your customers. If a defined event occurs (i.e. an order cancellation), KRYD immediately creates a custom-made e-mail campaign for each customer and sends it automatically- this rapidly increases your sales.
desc.de: Mit KRYD steigern Sie Umsatz und Kundenzufriedenheit durch individuelle E-Mails an Ihre Kunden. Vollautomatisch.
